posts.post_content: I think I may put this in my Lord of Tresserhorn EDH deck. The deck is built to mitigate his obvious drawback, mainly with creatures that do cool stuff when they die (i.e. [Keiga, the Tide Star](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Keiga, the Tide Star), [Tuktuk the Explorer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tuktuk the Explorer), [Noble Benefactor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Noble Benefactor) etc.). This would be a good sac outlet when Tressy's already on the battlefield.
